des: "This is a rye whiskey cocktail similar to its brother, the Manhattan, but this one has dry vermouth, optional Amer Picon, and a splash of maraschino liqueur. You can find Amer Picon online; if you like, use that in place of the bitters."
ins: Place ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour in rye whiskey and dry vermouth. Add aromatic bitters and maraschino liqueur. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass; garnish with lemon twist.
